evw-number.label: Enter your electronic visa wavier number
evw-number.legend: Enter your electronic visa wavier number
evw-number.hint: This is on your current electronic visa wavier document

dob.label: Date of Birth
dob.hint: Enter what is written in your passport. For example, 22 3 1979

email-us.header: Email us with your new travel details
email-us.request: Please email electronicvisawaiver@homeoffice.gsi.gov.uk with the new details for your journey to the UK.
email-us.call-out: We must receive your request at least 48 hours before your original travel date. Otherwise we won’t be able to change your electronic visa waiver

by-plane.name: new flight number (if your journey has any stops or connecting flights we only need details of the flight landing in the UK)
airport this flight takes off from
new date this flight takes off
new time this flight takes off
new date of arrival in the UK
new time of arrival in the UK

by-train.name: new train station you depart for the UK from
new date of departure for the UK
new time of departure for the UK
new date of arrival in the UK
new time of arrival in the UK

by-private-plane.name: tail number of the plane you’ll be taking
airport this flight takes off from
new date your flight takes off
new time your flight takes off
new date of arrival in the UK
new time of arrival in the UK

by-land.name: date of arrival in Northern Ireland
expected time of arrival at your destination in Northern Ireland
method of road travel to Northern Ireland, eg bus or private car
arrival point in Northern Ireland, for example, the town or bus station where your bus or car drops you off

by-boat.name: new boat name, eg ‘Spirit of Britain’
new port of departure for the UK, eg Calais
new date of departure for the UK
new time of departure for the UK
new port of arrival in the UK, eg Dover
new date of arrival in the UK
new time of arrival in the UK

link-sent.content: We have emailed you with a link for you to change your flight details.

evw-expired.content: You can no longer download your electronic visa waiver. This is because it is for a travel date in the past and has expired.

evw-number.required: Please enter your electronic visa wavier number
evw-number.alphanum: Please enter only letters and numbers

dob.future: Date of birth cannot be in the future
dob.format: Please use the correct date format, for example, 22 3 1979
dob.date: Please use the correct date format, for example, 22 3 1979

dob-year.date-year: Please use the correct date format, for example, 22 3 1979

404.title: The page or item you were looking for has not been found
404.description: Please check that you have entered the correct web address, or explore GOV.UK to find the information you need.

default.title: Sorry, something went wrong
default.message: A server exception occurred. Please try again.

session.title: Sorry, you'll have to start again
session.message: You haven't entered any details for 20 minutes, so we have cleared your information to keep it secure.

cookies-required.title: Cookies are required to use this service
cookies-required.message:
Cookies are required in order to use the BRP service.

Please enable cookies and try again. Find out how to we use cookies.
